data.text:
urban al khoory hotel one of the best hotel i stayed 👌👌👌👌👌👌👌👌👌👌👌👌👌staff very accomodating and very welcoming 
and receptionist romeo thank you for wonderful welcome We really appreciated and thank you for the help when i forgot my laptop charger you help me to give it back.Thank you veryyy much.👏👏👏
data.title: Amazinggggggggggg wonderfullllllllllll very helpfulllllllll accomodatingggggggggggg💕😍💕💕💕💕💕🥰🥰🥰🥰🥰🥰🥰🥰☺️☺️☺️☺

owner_response.title: Owner response
owner_response.text:
Dear Valued Guest, 

Thank you for sharing your wonderful experience. We are delighted to read that you enjoyed your stay with us at the Urban Al Khoory Hotel. Your kind words are highly appreciated. We look forward to welcoming you back for another memorable experience. 

Kind regards, 

Urban Al Khoory Hotel Management.
owner_response.author: Urban Al Khoory

data.text: Very excellence services with good reception with mr Romeo who guide as well. Beside from service very clean and neat room I’m so happy that I choose urban Al khoory hotels. As well the security very good attitude and polite when they approach
data.title: Excellent quality services which they provide as.

owner_response.title: Owner response
owner_response.text:
Dear Valued Guest, 

Firstly, we would like to express our sincerest appreciation to you for your patronage. We are delighted to read that your overall stay with us was enjoyable. It is truly wonderful to read positive feedback, especially your recognition of our colleagues and it will further encourage them to fulfill our mission to deliver service beyond expectations.

Kind regards, 

Urban Al Khoory Hotel Management.
owner_response.author: Urban Al Khoory

data.text: My staying was wonderful . Staff is very professional. I want to thank Romeo , he is a super kind receptionist. The room was perfectly cleaned thank to the job of perfect horse keeper in particular  Yubraj, but also too Ronan and Deepak. They also were promptly  helping me in any requests. Amazing staff and place!
data.title: Amazing staff and place

data.text: I am writing to let you know how much I appreciate the outstanding customer service that your staff Romeo has provided. Romeo have always been very attentive and helpful. He's kind gesture and hospitality has always been beyond satisfaction. Great location, really pleasant and clean rooms. ☺️
data.title: Satisfied Guest

data.text: Urban Al Khoory was clean, stylish, roomy with excellent service. Food was good and service was attentive and efficient.Everything about the hotel was exceptional. Room itself was well equipped and comfortable. Having most friendly and helpful receptionist especially Mr. Romeo.
data.title: Very hospitable staff and Helpful, Jolly and Kind I love his service.
